data.description: Perl module to parse MoPaQ Archive Format
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Due to this bug https://rt.cpan.org/Ticket/Display.html?id=71938 I
    asking for help to choose right name for the existing module (MPQ).

    Someone asked name before:
    http://www.xray.mpe.mpg.de/mailing-lists/modules/2010-12/msg00268.html

    I have MPQ::Archive class inside, so Archive::MPQ::Archive not
    pretty as for me :) Any suggestions? Thank you.
